title: Amazon: Road To $325
text: Amazon reported better than expected Q3'24 earnings, driven by strength in e-Commerce, but especially in Cloud. Amazon beat both top and bottom-line earnings by wide margins. The biggest take-away from the earnings report was that AWS-related operating income is surging. The firm's guidance for Q4 is solid. The fourth-quarter includes shopping events like Black Friday as well as the Christmas holidays which should lead to a boost platform spend.

title: US regulators reject amended interconnect agreement for Amazon data center
text: U.S. energy regulators rejected an amended interconnection agreement for an Amazon data center connected directly to a nuclear power plant in Pennsylvania, a filing showed on Friday.

title: Why Amazon must 'keep spending' on AI
text: Amazon (AMZN) topped third quarter earnings estimates on both revenue and profit. One key metric investors were closely watching is the company's capital expenditures, particularly those related to AI investments.

title: Jeff Bezos unloads $3B worth of Amazon stock in latest sale
text: Amazon founder Jeff Bezos is selling more than $3 billion worth of Amazon shares, according to a new regulatory filing revealed Friday, in his latest stock sale this year.

title: Breaking Down Magnificent 7 Earnings Results
text: Of the six members of ‘The Magnificent 7' group of stocks that have reported September-quarter results already, the market didn't like three – Apple AAPL, Microsoft MSFT, and Meta META – but loved the Tesla TSLA report and liked what it saw from Alphabet GOOGL and Amazon AMZN.

title: Nasdaq, S&P 500 rebound as Amazon surges, market shrugs off jobs data
text: US stocks staged a comeback on Friday as investors digested a big miss in the monthly jobs report and welcomed Amazon (AMZN) and Intel (INTC) earnings. The tech-heavy Nasdaq Composite (^IXIC) gained 0.8%, while the S&P 500 (^GSPC) rose 0.4%, both coming off a steep sell-off fueled by worries about Big Tech's artificial intelligence spending.

title: Stock Market This Week: AAPL, AMZN, MSFT Earnings Reports, SMCI's Stunning Sell-Off
text: A turbulent week led by Mega Cap earnings closed down for all indices aside from the RUT. Mixed bag reports from the Mag 7 giants were partly responsible for the end-of-week results.

title: Should Investors Chase the Rally in Amazon's Stock After Q3 Earnings?
text: Reporting impressive Q3 results after market hours on Thursday, Amazon's (AMZN) stock has jumped more than +7% in Friday's trading session.

title: Stock Market Today: Dow Climbs 288 Points After Amazon, Intel Earnings
text: Post-earnings strength from Amazon and Intel helped cushion the blow of a disappointing October jobs report.

title: 3-Stock Lunch: Apple, Amazon and Tesla
text: Quint Tatro, Joule Financial founder, joins 'Power Lunch' to discuss stock plays for three stocks.

title: Amazon Stock Today: Why This Iron Condor Could Make $178 Ahead Of The Elections
text: Why take a trade where the risk is often more than twice the reward? The post Amazon Stock Today: Why This Iron Condor Could Make $178 Ahead Of The Elections appeared first on Investor's Business Daily.

title: Microsoft, Amazon or Alphabet: Who Is Winning the Cloud Race?
text: As cloud computing transforms the digital landscape, industry giants Microsoft ( MSFT ), Amazon ( AMZN ), and Alphabet ( GOOGL ) dominate the race with their respective cloud platforms—Azure, AWS, and Google Cloud. Each company has invested heavily in AI, data storage, and innovative technologies to attract business clients and capture greater market share.

title: Amazon Rises the Most Since February After Earnings
text: Amazon reported strong results that showed a company humming on all cylinders, a testament to its efforts to cut and reallocate costs and put the cloud computing and e-commerce giant on sounder footing. Ramiz Chelat, portfolio manager at Vontobel Asset Management, joins Caroline Hyde and Ed Ludlow to discuss on "Bloomberg Technology.

title: Dominion Energy is discussing small nuclear reactors with other tech companies after Amazon agreement
text: Dominion CEO Robert Blue said the Virginia utility is discussing small modular reactors with other large data center customers. Dominion serves the largest data center market in the world in northern Virginia.

title: Amazon Analysts See Growth Ahead With AWS In 'Early Innings Of A Big AI Cycle,' Advertising Segment Fast-Growing 'Hidden Asset'
text: Amazon.com Inc AMZN analysts see strength in AWS, retail and advertising after the company's third-quarter results.

title: Amazon results show AWS growth outpacing expectations, but competitive pressures loom
text: Amazon.com Inc (NASDAQ:AMZN) put out its Q3 results last night highlighted by strong performance from Amazon Web Services. Analysts at Jefferies cited sustained revenue momentum for AWS driven by growing demand in emerging technologies.

title: Big tech signals on capex payoff
text: CNBC's Deidre Bosa joins 'Money Movers' to discuss how AI spending showed up in tech earnings.

title: Amazon: A Machine From The Top Down
text: The management style adopted by Andy Jassy at Amazon is a feature, not a bug, in our view. We believe his approach will benefit long-term investors. The quarter just printed was strong, and we think Amazon stock has a meaningful near-term upside. We rate AMZN stock at Hold.

title: US Stocks Jump on Amazon, Intel Strength; Fed's Rate Cut in Focus Next Week
text: Dow and Nasdaq climb on Amazon and Intel growth; rate cut likely as Fed monitors softer jobs data. Read on for insights into the latest market moves.

title: Nasdaq Surges Over 200 Points; Amazon Shares Jump After Strong Results
text: U.S. stocks traded higher midway through trading, with the Nasdaq Composite gaining more than 200 points on Friday.

title: AMZN Earnings Show Company "Doing Everything Right"
text: Anthony Ferry says the shining example of Amazon's success comes from its advertising and AWS segments. Ali Mogharabi agrees, also noting margin expansion and fulfillment process as opportunities to extend its ecommerce dominance.

title: Nasdaq, S&P 500 rebound amid Amazon cheer, jobs report
text: US stocks jumped and were set for a comeback on Friday as investors digested a big miss in the monthly jobs report and welcomed Amazon (AMZN) and Intel (INTC) earnings. The tech-heavy Nasdaq Composite (^IXIC) surged 1.2%, while the S&P 500 (^GSPC) rose about 1%, both coming off a steep sell-off fueled by worries about Big Tech's artificial intelligence spending.

title: Amazon shares jump 7%, approach record after earnings beat
text: Amazon shares rallied on Friday following better-than-expected third-quarter results. The company's cloud and advertising units drove growth.

title: Amazon Stock Climbs as Analysts Raise Price Targets on Soaring AI Growth
text: Amazon (AMZN) shares jumped Friday as multiple analysts raised their price targets for the e-commerce giant following third-quarter results that topped expectations.

title: Why Amazon Stock Rallied Friday Morning
text: Cloud growth is accelerating, and profits are booming, with a little help from artificial intelligence (AI).

title: Amazon Leads Dow Jones Stocks After Stellar Earnings Report
text: Amazon stock is higher Friday after the e-commerce and cloud giant reported strong Q3 earnings and Wall Street sees even more upside ahead. Here's why.

title: Amazon ETFs Set to Surge on Q3 Earnings Beat
text: Amazon outpaces both earnings and revenue estimates driven by growth in its cloud computing and advertising businesses.

text: Ivan Feinseth is bullish on Apple (AAPL) despite some disappointment in its latest earnings report. He believes the A.I.

title: Amazon Stock Eyes Record Highs After Earnings

title: Amazon's cloud growth takes a backseat as this retail reality shines through
text: Often cloud growth drives Amazon's stock movements after earnings, but this time analysts are keying in on overall profit as well as retail momentum for nondiscretionary purchases.

title: Amazon's Earnings Proved Yet Again Why I'm Never Selling This Stock
text: Amazon continues to show why it is one of the best businesses in the world.

title: Top Analysts Weigh in on Apple and Amazon's Earnings
text: Mizuho's Jordan Klein and TD Cowen's Andrew Sherman discuss the key takeaways, positive and negative, from Apple and Amazon's latest earnings, and highlight other tech names on their radar.

text: Thomas Martin of GLOBALT Investments discusses the positive and negatives from Amazon and Apple's latest earnings reports.

title: Amazon Stock Pops 6% on Powerful Earnings Growth: 6 Key Metrics Investors Should See
text: The e-commerce giant's management is "encouraged by the start of the holiday season," its CFO said on the earnings call.

title: US Stocks Likely To Open Higher After 'Mag 7' Wrap Up Busy Week, Apple, Amazon And Intel On Radar: Investors Eye Monthly Jobs Report, Economist Says Earnings Won't Trump Bonds

title: Amazon Keeps Profit Margins in Orbit
text: The e-commerce giant's strong operating earnings are offsetting a huge jump in AI spending and countering worries of declining margins.

title: Nvidia Stock Rises Following Amazon, Intel Earnings. It's Still Set to End the Week Down.
text: Chipmaker Intel and e-commerce giant Amazon both reported quarterly earnings Thursday after the bell.

title: Amazon adds $117bn to its valuation as Q3 numbers beat the Street
text: It was a result worth $117 billion to investors as Amazon.com Inc (NASDAQ:AMZN) beat the Street with its third-quarter numbers. After hours, shares in the online retailer and web servers group rose 6%, nudging the value of the business close to the $2 trillion mark.
